unnormalised: Training regimens, eh? Reminds me of PT Usha's dedication! Dr. Sharma at NIS Patiala must've whipped her into shape. Even local kabaddi players in Haryana train like beasts. Heard they run 10 km every morning, then do strength training in some akhara, small maybe 500 sq ft, but effective! All for Rs. 5000 prize money.
normalised: Training regimens, eh? Reminds me of P T Usha's dedication! Doctor Sharma at N I S Patiala must have whipped her into shape. Even local kabaddi players in Haryana train like beasts. Heard they run ten kilometer every morning, then do strength training in some akhara, small maybe five hundred square feet, but effective! All for rupee five thousand prize money.
